new_description: A fast-acting nanite injection that heightens reflex loops and micro-muscle response. +1 bonus to your next Agility roll.
A strength-enhancing stim that floods the body with synthetic adrenaline. +1 bonus to your next Strength roll.
A neural alignment serum that steadies fine-motor control. +1 bonus to your next Finesse roll.
A temporary neural patch that sharpens intuition and sensory prediction. +1 bonus to your next Instinct roll.
An injectable charisma mod that boosts confidence and pheromonal output. +1 bonus to your next Presence roll.
A nootropic compound that spikes short-term intellect and recall. +1 bonus to your next Knowledge roll.
A compact medical injector loaded with clotting foam and nanite tissue repair. Restores 1d4 HP.
A mild stim patch that reduces stress hormones and stabilizes vitals. Clears 1d4 Stress.
A reactive gel applied to blades that adds an acidic burst on impact. Adds 1d6 to your next physical damage roll.
A pair of dissolving nootropic strips that flood the mind with clarity. Gain 2 Hope.
A retinal nanofluid that enhances low-light sensitivity. You can see in total darkness until your next rest.
A volatile micro-fusion cell that can be hurled at a target cluster. On hit, deals 1d20 plasma damage within Far range.
A calming electrolyte-nootropic blend that restores mental balance. Choose one additional downtime move.
An upgraded acid polymer that superheats on contact. Adds 1d8 to your next physical damage roll.
A skin-altering nanogel that reconfigures facial features. Spend 4 Hope to appear unrecognizable until next rest.
A one-use vial that releases micro-smoke drones. Roll d6s equal to Agility; add the highest to Evasion vs. that attack.
A leg-mounted actuator charge that launches you up to Far range once without rolling.
A rapid-acting chemical cocktail—mark 1 Stress to clear 1 HP.
A dual-dose medical injector that rebuilds soft tissue instantly. Restores 1d4+1 HP.
A concentrated stim patch that resets stress pathways. Clears 1d4+1 Stress.
A swarm of nanites that reknit damaged armor plating. Spend any amount of Hope to clear that many Armor Slots.
A bio-gel that filters oxygen from water through skin membranes. Breathe underwater minutes equal to your level.
A single-use microdrive that duplicates any stored data perfectly. After use, becomes inert silicon.
An upgraded plasma charge with doubled output. Deals 2d20 plasma damage within Far range.
An enhanced nanoshot that grants +1 Agility until your next rest.
Advanced muscle stim that grants +1 Strength until your next rest.
Optimized neural alignment implant granting +1 Finesse until next rest.
Refined AI-tuned patch that grants +1 Instinct until next rest.
Improved pheromone mod granting +1 Presence until next rest.
Advanced nootropic granting +1 Knowledge until next rest.
A rare experimental serum that lets the user blink through space within very Far range.
A microchip booster that ensures your next successful attack critically succeeds.
A volatile toxin gel that adds 1d12 to your next physical damage roll.
A neural-linked data drive that lets you temporarily load and cast one stored spell, then offload it.
Quantum dust that amplifies energy weapon output. Adds 1d12 to your next magic damage roll.
An industrial solvent that dissolves barriers in bright flashes—stand clear.
A short-range beacon that boosts allied morale. Allies in Close range roll d6 when spending Hope; on a 6, Hope isn’t spent.
A heavy plasma cell delivering 4d20 plasma damage within Far range.
A spinal implant chip that reduces gravitational pull, letting you fall slowly for minutes equal to your level.
A portable field device that nullifies magic and digital resonance within Far range for one scene.
A chaotic serum that triggers random recovery or visions of death. Roll d6 for varying effects.
A potent injectable that delivers 2d10 direct neural damage to a victim.
High-capacity stimpack restoring 1d4+2 HP.
Upgraded patch clearing 1d4+2 Stress.
A chemical cloud that scrambles biosign and digital traces, preventing tracking until next rest.
Deployable grav-wings granting flight for minutes equal to your level.
Releases a cacophony of ghostly feedback. All within Far range take 6d8 sonic damage.
An internal reactor shot that lets you exhale plasma fire. Make an Instinct roll; targets in front take 2d20 physical damage.
Deploys self-assembling nanowires forming a bridge up to Far range; dissolves after short rest.
A sedative capsule inducing full rest and clearing all Stress on waking.
A luxury nutrient kit that clears all HP and Stress and grants 1d4 Hope.
A dual-compound resin that permanently bonds objects together.
A nanite serum halving your body size with +2 Agility and –1 Proficiency until reverted.
A nanite expansion serum doubling your size with +2 Strength and +1 Proficiency until reverted.
Upon death, stores your last loadout data. An ally can absorb it, inheriting one of your cards before it dissolves.
A rest-time gel that clears 1d10 HP or 1d10 Stress when applied.
A high-intensity flash device blinding all targets within Close range until they take HP damage.
A lethal nanopoison: if you crit before your next long rest, your target dies. Fail—and so do you.
A single-use energy field that negates one instance of damage when Hope is spent, then shatters.
A miniaturized satellite uplink calling down a storm of kinetic rods. Deals 8d20 physical damage within Very Far range.
